definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: ´[[א]] + other num. usually precedes it Ex 38:25 + oft.; but foll. [[רִבּוֹא]] Ezr 2:64 + 2 t.; it follows also smaller no. Nu 3:50, 1Ki 5:12 (so SI); the noun foll. in sg.
